Package gui

Package gui contains the graphical user interface for the game

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ChancesListener
    The listener interface for receiving chances events.
    ExitMenu
    The Class ExitMenu.
    GameDriver  
    GamePanel
    The Class GamePanel.
    GameSettings
    The Class GameSettings.
    Grid
    The Class Grid.
    HelpMenu
    The Class HelpMenu to show help on the start frame.
    HitMissPanel
    A panel that displays hit and miss statistics.
    HitsListener
    The listener interface for receiving hits events.
    LoadGameMenu
    The Class LoadGameMenu.
    OpponentsGrid
    The Class OpponentsGrid.
    ProgressBarDemo
    The Class ProgressBarDemo will show a progress bar of 0% to 100%.
    SaveGameMenu
    The Class SaveGameMenu to Save a game in a file
    StartScreen
    The Class StartScreen create a frame with the first screen game
    StartScreenBackground
    The Class StartScreenBackground is used to create a new background image and to handle with the events on the first game frame
    StatisticsMenu
    The Class StatisticsMenu is used to show statistics before game starts

Package gui Description

Package gui contains the graphical user interface for the game
